linkedConnectors_subtitle: Your Radix Wallet is linked to the following desktop browser using the Connector browser extension.
linkedConnectors_newConnection_subtitle: Scan the QR code shown in the Radix Connector browser extension
linkedConnectors_newConnection_textField: Name this Connector, e.g. "Chrome on Macbook Pro"
linkedConnectors_removeConnectionAlert_m: You will no longer be able to connect your wallet to this device and browser combination
linkedConnectors_cameraPermissionDeniedA: Camera access is required to link to connector.
linkedConnectors_localNetworkPermissionD: Local Network access is required to link to connector.
